function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Origin of SARS-CoV from bats and transmission through intermediate sources like palm civets","Impact":"Potential for new contagious diseases to emerge and spread globally","Mitigation":"Enforcement of regulations to limit human intrusion into untouched ecologies and wildlife habitats","Technologies":"GIS mapping and monitoring, conservation drones, wildlife tracking technology","People":"Researchers, wildlife conservationists, global population","Owner":"Government organizations, environmental protection agencies"},{"Description":"Violation of ecosystem due to large human population gathering and intervention","Impact":"Increased exposure to unknown viruses and bacteria with potential threats to human health","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs, sustainable development practices, and implementation of environmental regulations","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring sensors, remote sensing technology, eco-friendly urban planning","People":"Global population, environmentalists, public health organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental NGOs"},{"Description":"Human-to-human transmission of SARS-CoV-2 leading to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Rapid and widespread transmission of the virus causing a global pandemic","Mitigation":"Promotion of hygiene practices, social distancing measures, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air quality monitoring systems, disease surveillance technology","People":"Global population, public health officials, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government organizations"}]}
